inclusion_criteria.Study design: Describe your inclusion criteria for study design (e.g., Randomized controlled trials).
inclusion_criteria.Participants: Describe your target population (e.g., Adult patients with type 2 diabetes).
inclusion_criteria.Intervention: Describe the intervention of interest (e.g., Treatment with semaglutide).
inclusion_criteria.Comparison: Describe the acceptable comparators (e.g., Placebo or other active antidiabetic drugs).
inclusion_criteria.Outcomes: Describe the outcomes of interest (e.g., Change in HbA1c, body weight).

exclusion_criteria.Study design: Describe exclusion criteria for study design (e.g., Observational studies, reviews).
exclusion_criteria.Participants: Describe populations to exclude (e.g., Patients with type 1 diabetes).
exclusion_criteria.Additional: Any other exclusion criteria (e.g., non-English articles).
